author: Cybernews
description:
On April 27, 2007, a massive cyberattack was launched against Estonia. Not some of its citizens, companies or institutions. The attack was aimed at the entire country. This event went down in history as the very first instance of state-on-state cyberwarfare: the world’s first true cyber war.

title: How Hackers Attacked an Entire Country
